#summary How to install the Subversive plugin used to download and upload code.
#labels Phase-Implementation

 * Open Eclipse
 * Go to Help->Software Updates->Available Software.
 * Click _"Add Site..."_ button and write the following location for Subversive plug-in: _http://download.eclipse.org/technology/subversive/0.7/update-site/_.
 * Also the update site for SVN Connectors can be added in the same way. The URL is _http://www.polarion.org/projects/subversive/download/eclipse/2.0/update-site/_ .
   [http://tonatiuh.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/eclipse/addSite.png]

 * Expand added _"Subversive Site"_ and select select _Subversive SVN Team Provider Plugin (Incuvation)_. 
 * Expand _"Subversive SVN Connectors Site"_ and select _"Suversive SVN Connectors"_.
   [http://tonatiuh.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/eclipse/softwareUpdates.png]
 * Push _"Install..."_ to start with the plugins installation. 
 * The update manager calculates dependencies. Select the features to install from the list and click the 'Next >'. 
   [http://tonatiuh.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/eclipse/featuresToInstall.png]

 * Accept the terms of licesnse. The plugin should now be installed.
 * Restart eclipse.

To anonymous download of Tonatiuh code read [Anonymous_Download] or read [Upload_to_Repository] to download code and upload changes.
